description: This file defines a Flutter widget screen for the manager's feedback center within a meal ordering platform. It includes UI components such as an app bar, header with gradient and shadow, and a list of feedback-related items, with permission checks for access control.

classes.name: ManagerFeedbackCenterScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the feedback center screen for managers, including permission verification and placeholder feedback items.

classes.name: _Item
classes.description: A reusable stateless widget for displaying individual feedback list items with icon and styled container.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the ManagerFeedbackCenterScreen, including UI layout and permission check.

methods.name: _Item.build
methods.description: Builds the UI component for each feedback list item with icon and label.
